com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary

Class KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary.KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults
  • Enclosing class:
    KSTNanoSDK

    public static class KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom class for Nano scan results Scan result objects contain wavelength and intensity information WARNING: This class is used by the Spectrum C library and must not change names or move from the current directory

    • Constructor Summary

      • getSpatialFreq

        public static double getSpatialFreq(Context ctx,
                                    double wavelength)
        Return the given wavelength in units of wavelength or wavenumber as determined by the setting stored in SettingsManager.SharedPreferencesKeys.spatialFreq
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context to use to retrieve the stored settings
        wavelength - the wavelength to convert
        Returns:
        return the given wavelength in units of wavelength or wavenumber
